CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-1-TEXT: Double damage and target's land speed is halved for 1d4 rounds
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-2-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %status-stunned=stunned% for 1 round
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-3-TEXT: Double damage and target is pushed 1d6 squares directly away
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-4-TEXT: Normal damage and target takes 1d4 ability damage of your choice
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-7-TEXT: Double damage and target is %status-nauseated=nauseated% for 1 round (%save-critical=Fort negates%)
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-9-TEXT: Double damage and target is %status-exhausted=exhausted% (%save-critical=Fort negates%)
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-10-TEXT: Double damage and 2 %status-bleed=bleed%. This bleed requires a DC 20 Heal check to stop
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-11-TEXT: Double damage and +2 on all your attack rolls for 1 round
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-12-TEXT: Double damage and one arm cannot move (DC 20 Str or Heal to be freed)
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-13-TEXT: Double damage and target begins to drown 3 round later. DC 20 Fort save each round to end effect
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-15-TEXT: Normal damage and 1d2 %ability-dex=Dex% %ability-damage=damage%. -4 penalty on all rolls using that hand %until-healed=until healed%
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-16-TEXT: Double damage and 1 %status-bleed=bleed%. Target takes 1 additional bleed each round %until-healed=until healed%
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-18-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %status-stunned=stunned% for 1d6 rounds (%save-critical=Fort save each round to act%)
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-20-TEXT: Double damage and target %status-sickened=sickened% for 2d4 round (%save-critical=Fort negates%)
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-21-TEXT: Normal damage and 1d2 %ability-dex=Dex% %ability-damage=damage%. Target's speeds are reduced by half %until-healed=until healed%
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-22-TEXT: Normal damage and -4 penalty on attack rolls, skill checks and ability checks for 1d4 rounds
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-23-TEXT: Double damage to target and normal damage to adjacent target
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-24-TEXT: Double damage and target is knocked %status-prone=prone%
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-25-TEXT: Double damage and target is poisoned (treat as greenblood oil)
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-26-TEXT: Double damage and 1d6 %status-bleed=bleed% if from ranged attack
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-27-TEXT: Normal damage and 1d4 %status-bleed=bleed%. Target gains 50% spell failure chance for verbal spells %until-healed=until healed%
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-29-TEXT: Double damage and target can take only one move or standard action until next round
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-30-TEXT: Double damage and target is %status-dazed=dazed% for 1 round
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-31-TEXT: Normal damage and 1d2 %ability-con=Con% %ability-damage=damage%. Target does not heal this damage naturally
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-33-TEXT: Double damage and target contracts filth fever (%save-critical=Fort negates%)
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-34-TEXT: Normal damage and target provokes attacks of opportunity from all threatening opponents
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-35-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %status-flat-footed=flat-footed% for 1 round
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-36-TEXT: Triple damage and 1d2 %ability-con=Con% %ability-drain=drain%. -4 Spot, Search and ranged attacks %until-healed=until healed%
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-37-TEXT: Double damage and target is disarmed (1 item)
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-39-TEXT: Double damage and one free attack against the target with a -5 penalty
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-42-TEXT: Normal damage and 1 %ability-con=Con% %ability-damage=damage%. Target gains 50% spell failure chance for verbal spells %until-healed=until healed%
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-44-TEXT: Double damage and target takes a -2 penalty to AC for 1d4 rounds
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-45-TEXT: Double damage and target drops whatever is being held (1 item)
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-47-TEXT: Double damage and target cannot move (DC 20 Str check negates)
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-48-TEXT: Double damage and +4 to your AC for 1 round
CARD-CRITICAL-PIERCING-51-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %status-sickened=sickened% for 1d6 rounds
